name: Kyogre ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_body.name: Frenzy
poke_body.effect: As long as your opponent has Groudon, Groudon ex, Rayquaza, or Rayquaza ex in play. Kyogre ex’s attacks do 40 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Aqua Supply
attacks.effect: You may attach a basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tsunami
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
